casebody.data:
John PAFF, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
OCEAN COUNTY PROSECUTOR'S OFFICE, Defendant-Respondent. M-621/622/623/636/637 September Term 2017
078040 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 26, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motions to take judicial notice of records (M-621) and to file a reply brief (M-622) are granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motions to dismiss the appeal (M-623), to strike portions of the defendant's answer to plaintiffs motion to file a reply brief (M-636), and to file a sur-reply brief (M-637) are denied.
